sentences.sContent: The springs roil the waters they flow into in a phantasmal slipstream.
sentences.sContent_eng: The springs roil the waters they flow into in a phantasmal slipstream.
sentences.sCn: 泉水涌动着死海的水，形成一种幻影般的水流效果。

sentences.sContent: The conversation at the table mixed in with his phantasmal orchestra till he thought: 'What a fluty voice one of those milkmaids has!
sentences.sContent_eng: The conversation at the table mixed in with his phantasmal orchestra till he thought: 'What a fluty voice one of those milkmaids has!
sentences.sCn: 桌子上的谈话混合在他幻想中的管弦乐曲里，他心里想：“在这些挤奶女工中间，有一个姑娘的声音多么清脆悦耳呀！

words.tran: 幽灵的；幻觉的；有名无实的
幻影似的；变幻不定的；幻想的；幽灵的
